page.title: 17Four Oaks - Social Concerns
page.content: Although Four Oaks has always been considered an area associated with much wealth and unlimited resources it still has its problems.The very nature of the environment has in itself led to some of these problems.One of these is housing,not the lack of it,but the desire to build more and more.This has of course caused great controversy among the people in the areas directly affected by such plans.The area to the north of Lindrosa Road is considered one of outstanding natural rarity.Here wild plants and creatures exist in a habitat that has existed for 'ages' and without which they would die out. Great concern is being shown by the local residents about plans to build over this unique domain.Other schemes for building in the area are also being monitored very carefully to prevent overcrowding.
